feed.title: Cypress Hills (Provincial Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Cypress Hills (Provincial Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:20 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -7.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cypress Hills Provincial Park 08:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
Temperature: -7.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 91 %
Dewpoint: -8.4°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of light snow. High minus 3 except zero near the Alberta border. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow early this morning. Clearing near noon. Fog patches dissipating near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 3 except zero near the Alberta border. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 15 except minus 9 near the Alberta border.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Fog patches developing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15 except minus 9 near the Alberta border. Wind chill minus 9 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Mainly sunny. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 21 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Wednesday 18 January 2023
